kv12.9:1.5_0: Hañci diṭṭhisampanno puggalo āpāyike rūpe rajjeyya, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv12.9:2.7_0: amanussitthiyā tiracchānagatitthiyā nāgakaññāya methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭiseveyya, ajeḷakaṁ paṭiggaṇheyya, kukkuṭasūkaraṁ paṭiggaṇheyya, hatthigavassavaḷavaṁ paṭiggaṇheyya …
kv12.9:2.10_0: Hañci diṭṭhisampanno puggalo tittiravaṭṭakamorakapiñjaraṁ paṭiggaṇheyya, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv12.9:3.1_0: Diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa pahīnā duggati, diṭṭhisampanno puggalo āpāyike rūpe rajjeyyāti?
kv12.9:3.3_0: Arahato pahīnā duggati, arahā āpāyike rūpe rajjeyyāti?
kv12.9:3.5_0: diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa pahīnā duggati, diṭṭhisampanno puggalo āpāyike sadde …
kv12.9:3.11_0: Arahato pahīnā duggati, arahā tittiravaṭṭakamorakapiñjaraṁ paṭiggaṇheyyāti?
kv12.9:4.1_0: Arahato pahīnā duggati, na ca arahā āpāyike rūpe rajjeyyāti?
kv12.9:4.3_0: Diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa pahīnā duggati, na ca diṭṭhisampanno puggalo āpāyike rūpe rajjeyyāti?
kv12.9:4.5_0: arahato pahīnā duggati, na ca arahā āpāyike sadde …pe…
kv12.9:4.9_0: amanussitthiyā tiracchānagatitthiyā nāgakaññāya methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭiseveyya, ajeḷakaṁ paṭiggaṇheyya, kukkuṭasūkaraṁ paṭiggaṇheyya, hatthigavassavaḷavaṁ paṭiggaṇheyya …pe…
kv12.9:4.12_0: Diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa pahīnā duggati, na ca diṭṭhisampanno puggalo tittiravaṭṭakamorakapiñjaraṁ paṭiggaṇheyyāti?
kv12.9:5.8_0: Tena hi diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa pahīnā duggatīti.
